metadatatag: User copyright information (can be set in camera) Image rating (0-5 stars)

type: Touch screen vari angle 7.7cm (3.0") 3:2 Clear View II TFT, approx. 1040K dots

slideshow: Image selection: All images, by Date, Folder, Movies, Stills Playback time: 1/2/3/5/10/20 seconds Repeat: On/Off Background music: On/Off Transition effect: Off, Slide in 1, Slide in 2, Fade 1, Fade 2, Fade 3
